name: Runic Cleansing
description:
You specialize in removing curses from people's homes. Make your way through each house, placing blessed runes on the marked locations, but watch out for cursed monsters!

Place all your runes to win the level. However, choose the placement order carefully, since runes only give you bonuses when they are in your inventory.

Controls:
Move with WASD or the arrow keys.
Open/close doors and place runes with left click or J.
Cycle through your rune inventory with Q/E.

Made by Anopob and Neil for Kenney Jam 2020. The theme was "cursed".
